response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies from person to person. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to own it for a special price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant discount compared to its market value. I believe this price reflects the quality and potential of the product, while also allowing you to secure a valuable asset at an advantageous cost. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need more information about the product.", "product_price": 750000}
